name: Peanut Media
description:
Peanut Media Co. is your one-stop for marketing solutions. We specialize with nonprofit organizations, small businesses, and real estate professionals.
We offer a la carte marketing & design in the categories of graphic design and internet presence, including but not limited to flyers, newsletters, photography, websites, blogging, e-newsletters, promo material, identity and branding, social media, and updating content management systems.
